1.title: Translation demo
1.text: This is a simple demonstration app for ngx-translate

pluralization.things: There {count, plural, =0{is} one{is} other{are}} {count, plural, =0{} one{a} other{several}} {count, plural, =0{nothing} one{thing} other{things}}
pluralization.people: {gender, select, male{He is} female{She is} other{They are}} {gender, select, male{funny} female{funny} other{funny}}

2.noVariables: And this one has no variables
